title: Director of Digital & Social Media - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Digital & Social Media College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Serve as the athletic departments digital & social media expert with direct oversight and daily management of our social media platforms-Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat & Periscope.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
